base_template.name: Bootstrap Base
base_template.html:
<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
    <head>
        <style>
            {{css}}
        </style>
        <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.0.2/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet" integrity="sha384-EVSTQN3/azprG1Anm3QDgpJLIm9Nao0Yz1ztcQTwFspd3yD65VohhpuuCOmLASjC" crossorigin="anonymous">
    </head>
    <body>
        {% block content %}{% endblock %}
    </body>
</html>

template.name: All Fields - Alerts
template.template_md:
{% block content %}

Alerts

{% for item in data_sources.allFieldsAlerts %} {% endfor %}
id agent_id assigned_check_id assigned_task_id alert_type message alert_time snoozed snooze_until resolved resolved_on severity email_sent resolved_email_sent sms_sent resolved_sms_sent hidden action_run action_stdout action_stderr action_retcode action_execution_time resolved_action_run resolved_action_stdout resolved_action_stderr resolved_action_retcode resolved_action_execution_time
{{ item.id }} {{ item.agent_id }} {{ item.assigned_check_id }} {{ item.assigned_task_id }} {{ item.alert_type }} {{ item.message }} {{ item.alert_time }} {{ item.snoozed }} {{ item.snooze_until }} {{ item.resolved }} {{ item.resolved_on }} {{ item.severity }} {{ item.email_sent }} {{ item.resolved_email_sent }} {{ item.sms_sent }} {{ item.resolved_sms_sent }} {{ item.hidden }} {{ item.action_run }} {{ item.action_stdout }} {{ item.action_stderr }} {{ item.action_retcode }} {{ item.action_execution_time }} {{ item.resolved_action_run }} {{ item.resolved_action_stdout }} {{ item.resolved_action_stderr }} {{ item.resolved_action_retcode }} {{ item.resolved_action_execution_time }}
{% endblock %}
